I dont go to pilots very often but every time i do, its a problem.  Never any clean showers. Always have to wait. The app had been saying i was next for 10-15 minutes.  When the shower was finally clean they let someone else go in my shower ‚Ä¶
Grate shower, clean inside, nice workers, thank you üòä ‚Ä¶

the shower is very expensive I paid $18 and they don't have soap

‚Ä¶ You can find a FedEx and UPS drop box here if you are looking to drop off a package. The facilities here are really clean and you can even take a shower if you'd like. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , we need the resting areas to be available to us. There are times that we have no time to use the rest room- and take a shower but when we do, ‚ÄúUnfortunately‚Äù it is ‚ÄúCLOSED‚Äù. It is unacceptable for the resting area (to take a shower) ‚Ä¶

I work in construction and find myself on the road for two or three weeks at a time quite often so I come here from time to time to take a shower. it's a great place with great people. I've always been treated very friendly, until today. ‚Ä¶

Really getting run down. Lack of maintenance.  All trash cans were full . Almost all showers were dirty. The shower I had was not cleaned. Just put new towels in and lifted the toilet seat. Sure has gone down hill.  Dennys has been closed ‚Ä¶
One of the best places to shower at Flying J. They actually clean and water pressure is great. And they stay on top of cleaning the showers. Very nice shower attendants!!!
Shower was nice compared to other pilot showers, ihop was a nice change from fast food. No complaints in parking or fueling either. DD Trucker reviews

A spot to get gas, food, take a hot shower, get your clothes washed and relax!

‚Ä¶ There are only 2 showers and you 45 minutes to use them. $10 shower charge plus $3 towel and wash cloth charge, $3 additional for an extra set if there are 2 using the one shower and $10 additional for any time spent or the 45 minutes. The ‚Ä¶

Showers are small hot & there is no place to lay your stuff out. The shower attendant was a really rude woman. The rest of the truck stop is okay as long as you aren‚Äôt looking for any hot food. Subway closes early so there are only hot dogs ‚Ä¶
The time before this time, shower had long black hair in the sink‚Ä¶gross! ‚Ä¶

Wow we're can you go do laundry eat get the best service shower all in one.debra.kristein tobbyb.there a couple others.but these 3 our amazing debra always smiling even if it's busy truck drivers getting weights customers getting supplies ‚Ä¶

Went over to use the shower. What a joke. Attendant was clueless. Paid for a shower and was told I would have to wait in the lounge (nice lounge, quiet, has a tv and computer. Also has sitting for relaxing or eating) until available. 40 ‚Ä¶

Great, clean, friendly, top quality, and clean shower's!! This is a great place, but no goofy business, this place is strict. Loved It!!
It's just a great place to get gas, eat, and shower and maybe rest a bit.

showerReviews.reviewText: 24 hour store. Diner closed Sunday. B&G were okay and home fries were undercooked, some almost raw. One shower $15. Nice little truck stop with one of those gas station chicken places inside too.
If I were a trucker, I'd love this place. Shower, fried chicken, lots of convenience items. Open 24 hours. Big back lot.
‚Ä¶ Their facilities are clean, stocked well and their staff members are friendly. There‚Äôs a shower if you need one with your stanky a$$. ‚Ä¶

Nice little ma and pop truck stop. $7 for a shower. Not sure if you have to pay to park. Food is fresh & homemade and very very good. Service is great. Will be back again. $8.95 for meal in picture (and 2 pieces of toast). Can‚Äôt beat it!

Great little truck stop.  The shower was pretty good for five bucks.  I'd definitely shower here again.  Food wasn't bad either.  Only complaint I have about the food was the canned carrots, otherwise, it was hot and tasted pretty decent ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ little restaurant is good and reasonably priced. You get big portions and the service is really good. The only issue I had was the cleanliness of the $10 shower. Probably won‚Äôt shower here again. Other than that, nice little place to stop ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . It has very kind people and amazing home cooked food. It is amazing with lots of space. Not too loud and yet, you can tell the place has vigour. They even have a shower too which is amazing. And the coffee is better then the big stops.

‚Ä¶ stop. There is paved parking lot with out holes and it doesn't get to busy. Pumps are new and work very well. Shower is older but clean, shower stall is a bit tight but enough to get the job done. Food is delicious ans priced very well.

Arlenes truck stop just honestly has a little of everything to offer! Out on the road traveling and need an affordable place to shower for just 7 dollars! Or pop over to the restaurant and get a trucker sized meal for some of the best ‚Ä¶
Usually plenty of parking, even late at night. They are still closing at 8pm even for fuel/bathrooms, but there is a port-a-john outside. $5 shower, friendly staff. Good local spot, and quiet.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Rooms were very clean and quiet. Staff was super friendly and helpful. There is no elevator, so request a first floor room if you find stairs hard to navigate. Continental breakfast was very good! Location was absolutely perfect for us. I will definitely be going back! Dog friendly also!

We have stayed at this property several times over several years. It is convenient as it is only one of two hotels in the general area. It continues to be one of the cleanest and nicest Wyndham properties we have stayed at anywhere.
